name: formstack-create-form
description: Create a new form in your account. [See docs here](https://formstack.readme.io/docs/form-post)

fields.description: Array of Field resources IDs. [See fields docs here](https://formstack.readme.io/docs/field-types). E.g. `[ { "field_type": "name", "label": "Name" } ]`

language.description: The language for the form - [use ISO 639-1 language codes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes)

db.description: Flag to disable or enable submissions to be saved in our database

password.description: Sets a password for the form

name: formstack-create-form-submission
description: Create a new submission for the specified form. [See docs here](https://formstack.readme.io/docs/form-id-submission-post)

fields.description: Value that should be stored for a specific field on the form. For this parameter, x must contain the id of the field whose value should be set. For fields with subfields (name, address, etc), use array notation with each item being the subfield and each key being the name of that subfield. E.g. { "field_12345": { "first": "John", "last": "Smith" } }

encryptionPassword.description: The password used to decrypt your submissions. Without this value, you will only receive the submission ID and the success message when submitting encrypted forms

name: formstack-get-form
description: Get the details of the specified form. [See docs here](https://formstack.readme.io/docs/form-id-get)
